name: Demons & Sinners
description:
You've committed a horrible sin. Your devotion has given you the opportunity to redeem yourself.
7 demons are hungry for souls. Solve the riddles to feed them.

Made for the Pizza Jam 4 in 48 hs.

Art by Franco Chioraria & Kate Olmazabal

Programming by Marcos Alvarez and Emanuel Rodriguez

Game Design by Tomas Diez

Music by Lorenzo Gutierrez
